title: Scourge of the Corruptor
summaries: The Scourge of the Corruptor is a Hardmode post-Plantera melee weapon that fires projectiles. It is always found inside the Dungeon's Corruption Chest in Corruption worlds. A Corruption Key is needed to open the Corruption Chest.

The Scourge of the Corruptor fires an Eater's Bite, a fast javelin head that looks like a small Eater of Souls, then splits into 2–4 or 15 (see Notes) / 2–5 Tiny Eaters upon impact with a solid block or enemy. These smaller projectiles have homing capabilities, can travel approximately 350 tiles, and ricochet up to 5 times before dissipating. Both the Eater's Bite and Tiny Eaters are unaffected by gravity.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 70 / 64 / 57 (Melee)
statistics.Tooltip: A powerful javelin that unleashes tiny eaters
